page.title: 16Nether Kellet Village
page.content: The people in the village own the village hall. There is no special owner. The village hall is situated on Show Lane, straight across from the village green. There are many weekly activities such as brownies, playgroups, youth clubs, cubs and scouts and the Women's Institute meet once a month. All this is{recreation. The occasional activities that occur are family nights, parties, discos and barbecues. The village green sees many activities. Lots of exciting events take place there including Field Day, pancake races, sports day, rounders rallies and lots more. On Field Day most of the children dress up and the Nether Kellet Queen rides on a float with two attendants and a page boy. She is crowned on the village green.
